name: generate_valid_types
description: Generates an exhaustive set of type expressions for a given nesting depth.

name: list_files
description: Lists all files in a given directory by recursively iterating over its contents and returning a list of file names.

name: expand
description: This function recursively generates a set of type expressions by nesting containers ("list", "dict", "tuple", "set") with primitive types ("int", "float", "bool", etc.).
